video.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal
video.synopsis: Amateur duelist Yuma hones his skills with help from Astral, a spirit from another universe who's searching for his missing memories.

episodes.synopsis: Yuma puts his deck on the line and stands to lose everything when he challenges Shark, the school's leading duelist and biggest bully.
episodes.title: Go With the Flow, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In the thick of Yuma's duel with Shark, an enigmatic visitor from another world arrives, and suddenly Yuma finds himself headed for disaster.
episodes.title: Go With the Flow, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a malicious virus infects computers and thrusts the city into chaos, Yuma and Tori set out on a mission to find the culprit.
episodes.title: In the End, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Yuma must outwit his math teacher in a duel before all his life points are subtracted and the virus planted in the city's computer system goes viral.
episodes.title: In the End, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a classmate offers Yuma a special monster card, Tori and Bronk try to warn him of the potential dangers ahead, but to little avail.
episodes.title: Flipping Out, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Yuma finds himself under pressure to beat Flip when he realizes it's not only his Utopia card at stake, but his new friend Astral, too.
episodes.title: Flipping Out, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a popular TV celebrity becomes possessed by a Number Card, Yuma challenges him to a duel that puts Astral's safety on the line.
episodes.title: The Sparrow, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the Sparrow and his powerful Galaxy Queen before Nelson and Astral disappear forever.
episodes.title: The Sparrow, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In order to find his missing friend Tori, Yuma must face off against a feline fanatic who has the purr-fect response to his every move.
episodes.title: Feline Frenzy

episodes.synopsis: When Shark starts running with the wrong crowd and gives up dueling, Yuma pulls out all the stops to try to bring him back to the battlefield.
episodes.title: Shark Attack

episodes.synopsis: When The Pack conspires to frame Shark for stealing a priceless deck, Yuma challenges the thugs to a duel in an effort to save his classmate's skin.
episodes.title: The Pack, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the tag team of Yuma and Shark faces the Pack, the duel builds to a fever pitch. If Yuma loses, he will also forfeit Utopia.
episodes.title: The Pack, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yuma and Astral face their toughest battle ever when they're forced to duel a mysterious individual who hunts Number Cards.
episodes.title: The Number Hunter, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As his tense duel with the Number Hunter escalates, Yuma must push beyond his limits or he'll lose his cards, his friend and his very soul.
episodes.title: The Number Hunter, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The legendary Dark Magician and Blue-Eyes White Dragon come out of retirement when a wise old man named Master Roku challenges Yuma to a duel.
episodes.title: Training Days, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After challenging Master Roku's former student to a duel, Yuma draws on what he has learned to try to beat the evil Kaze and save a legendary deck.
episodes.title: Training Days, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a fortuneteller agrees to help out Yuma's friends, they soon land in a terrifying situation, and Yuma must outwit the seer to save them.
episodes.title: It’s in the Cards, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul.
episodes.title: It’s in the Cards, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Yuma realizes that the Golden Key his father gave him is missing, Astral helps him retrace his steps, and Yuma shares the story of its origins.
episodes.title: The Edge of the World

episodes.synopsis: Yuma gets into a fight with Bronk, but a far greater test of their friendship comes when an evil Number Card takes control of Yuma.
episodes.title: Roots of the Problem

episodes.synopsis: Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot, only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a notorious jewel thief.
episodes.title: Battle With the Bot

episodes.synopsis: Shark takes on the role of underdog when he challenges the cunning Kite to a duel in hopes of stopping him from stealing Yuma's prized Golden Key.
episodes.title: The Shark Hunter

episodes.synopsis: With his Golden Key in Kite's possession, Yuma is forced to track down the Number Hunter if he ever wants to see his friend Astral again.
episodes.title: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While Yuma continues to search for Astral and the Golden Key, Astral looks for a way to defeat Kite and save all his Number Cards.
episodes.title: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When time stops unexpectedly, Kite gains the upper hand by tapping into Astral's memories, reliving battles he and Yuma fought together.
episodes.title: Frozen in Time

episodes.synopsis: Eager to take on the best of the best at the World Duel Carnival, Yuma makes the stunning realization that he never entered in the first place.
episodes.title: Let the Duels Begin

episodes.synopsis: As the World Duel Carnival kicks off, Yuma accepts a challenge from Striker, a soccer player turned duelist with just one goal in mind: victory.
episodes.title: A Team Performance

episodes.synopsis: After his latest win, Yuma tries to keep the momentum going and rises up to the challenge of a pint-sized duelist and his deck of monster machines.
episodes.title: Heavy Metal

episodes.synopsis: Yuma learns a hard lesson about the consequences of breaking someone's heart when Anna, a girl who once loved him, returns to take her revenge.
episodes.title: Love Hurts

episodes.synopsis: Yuma faces a tough test when he takes on an opponent who loves tomatoes, a food he detests. Can he conquer his own taste buds to win?
episodes.title: No Tomato

episodes.synopsis: Yuma goes for a wild ride when Kari's friend steals a lucky card, forcing Yuma to rely on pure skill to beat the most fortunate player alive.
episodes.title: Life Is a Carnival, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Yuma's duel atop an out-of-control monorail takes a bad turn, thanks to a Number Card that guarantees victory to his opponent.
episodes.title: Life Is a Carnival, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Caswell and Bronk experience a dream come true when their favorite duelist in the world challenges them to a match ... and they accept.
episodes.title: Foolish Fans

episodes.synopsis: Shark tastes revenge as he prepares to sink his teeth into a duel with Quattro. But he gets drawn into an underwater battle with another foe instead.
episodes.title: Shark Bait

episodes.synopsis: Yuma hunts down a photographer whose pictures can predict the future. But the image that appears for Yuma and his friend Tori isn't so bright.
episodes.title: Bad Developments, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Just as Cameron's photo predicted, a damaged airship leaves Tori's future up in the air. Can Yuma change the picture and save his friend?
episodes.title: Bad Developments, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Flip accidentally dozes off, missing the first day of the World Duel Carnival, he'll need a sweet plan to face the strongest finalists.
episodes.title: Double Jeopardy, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Astral missing, Yuma must rely on his skills alone to defeat Nistro and Dextra, save his deck and retain his place in the competition.
episodes.title: Double Jeopardy, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Yuma's Heart Pieces are swiped by a pack of stray dogs, Cathy's feline friends help her hunt them down, leading her into a surprising duel.
episodes.title: Pets Peeved

episodes.synopsis: After using his powers to escape from Heartland City, Hart unleashes a torrent of destruction that only Yuma can possibly stop.
episodes.title: About Hart

episodes.synopsis: As Kite desperately searches for his missing brother, Vetrix decides it's time to put his diabolical plan for revenge into motion.
episodes.title: Losing Hart

episodes.synopsis: While Yuma and Kite battle Quattro and Trey, Vetrix takes the next step on his malevolent mission to drain Hart of all his powers.
episodes.title: A Dubious Duo

episodes.synopsis: Kite struggles to put his ego aside and accept Yuma's help so that the duo can take down Trey and Quattro and deliver Hart back to safety.
episodes.title: The Dragon Awakens

episodes.synopsis: Faced with tough decisions, Yuma decides to run away from his problems and search for his father ... until he's confronted by Master Roku.
episodes.title: Rock and a Hard Place

episodes.synopsis: Feathers fly during the race for entry into the World Duel Carnival when hotheaded Nistro clashes with TV superhero "The Sparrow."
episodes.title: Ruffled Feathers

episodes.synopsis: Yuma receives an unexpected visitor when Trey shows up and discovers the guarded secret behind Yuma's incredible dueling skills.
episodes.title: Family Leave

episodes.synopsis: After accepting Trey's challenge to a duel, Yuma is alarmed to discover that Trey has acquired a dark and dangerous new power.
episodes.title: Sky's the Limit

episodes.synopsis: With the bond between Astral and Yuma broken, Trey exploits Yuma's vulnerability and takes aim at the rest of his precious life points.
episodes.title: Exit: Astral

episodes.synopsis: The battle between Trey and Yuma reaches its climax, as Yuma struggles to win without Astral's help and make it to the finals alive.
episodes.title: Crestfallen

episodes.synopsis: Yuma and his friends are set to attend an extra-special event, but Yuma doesn't have his invitation and must find another way to get in.
episodes.title: Party Panic

episodes.synopsis: Yuma faces a different kind of challenge at the World Duel Carnival Finals, when the finalists wind up dueling on a roller coaster.
episodes.title: Roller Duel!

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to find out how good a duelist Yuma really is, Vetrix brings in a threesome called the Triad of Terror to take him on.
episodes.title: Roller Coaster Rampage!

episodes.synopsis: Yuma must deal with a treacherous turn of events when the finalists at the World Duel Carnival wind up in the Dragon's Den.
episodes.title: Test Your Luck!

episodes.synopsis: Vetrix faces off against Dextra in a duel in the jungle, and whichever one wins will wind up in the World Duel Carnival semifinals.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Quinton is matched up against Kite in a duel, but when he takes a timeout, there's a revelation about Yuma's father.
episodes.title: Portal of Doom

episodes.synopsis: After pausing to reveal the mystery behind the disappearance of Yuma's father, Quinton resumes his duel with Kite, which ends dramatically.
episodes.title: Cosmic Chaos

episodes.synopsis: Shark, still awaiting his revenge, winds up face to face with his nemesis Quattro at last. But how will this battle end?
episodes.title: Depths of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: The dramatic duel between Shark and Quattro comes to its conclusion, and Shark must win -- both for the sake of the tournament and for justice.
episodes.title: Swimming with Sharks

episodes.synopsis: The stakes are high when Yuma comes up against Nistro in a duel to determine which one of them will nab the last spot in the semifinals.
episodes.title: Rockin’ and Rollin’

episodes.synopsis: Yuma's deck has gone missing. In an effort to recover it, he and his crew embark on a search that leads them to Heartland City.
episodes.title: Doctor Visit

episodes.synopsis: In the first duel of the semifinals, Yuma is up against Shark, who seems to be underperforming, but it may be a trick to catch Yuma off guard.
episodes.title: Duel of Destiny: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The confrontation between Yuma and Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals comes to its conclusion, with the winner moving to the next level.
episodes.title: Duel of Destiny: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When matched up against the Number Hunter Kite, the masked duelist Vetrix finds a way to take his opponent by surprise.
episodes.title: The Hart of the Matter

episodes.synopsis: The duel between Kite and Vetrix comes to its conclusion at last, as Yuma endeavors to rescue Kite's brother Hart from Vetrix.
episodes.title: Change of Hart

episodes.synopsis: After all the other duels, everything boils down to this final battle between Yuma and Vetrix for the World Duel Carnival Championship.
episodes.title: Sphere of Fear: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The duel between Vetrix and Yuma is finally coming to an end. But just when things are looking darkest for Yuma, he makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Sphere of Fear: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In this battle, Yuma's got a lot to lose. But no matter the outcome, the epic duel between him and Vetrix will lead to major consequences.
episodes.title: Sphere of Fear: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Astral World is in big trouble, thanks to Dr. Faker's evil plot to destroy it. When Yuma finds out about the plan, he tries to find a way to stop it.
episodes.title: The Countdown Begins

episodes.synopsis: It will take more than one warrior to save Astral World from destruction at the hands of Dr. Faker. Yuma, Kite and Shark join forces against him.
episodes.title: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Having banded together, Yuma, Kite and Shark are all set to put an end to Dr. Faker's plans. But then shocking news comes to light.
episodes.title: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yuma, Kite and Shark already had their hands full. But they're in bigger trouble than ever with the arrival of a strange being from Barian World.
episodes.title: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Yuma and Kite square off against each other in what promises to be the showdown to end them all. Kite has a big surprise for Yuma.
episodes.title: Kite’s Plight: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the epic duel between Kite and Yuma comes to a close, it remains to be seen which way the tide of the battle will turn.
episodes.title: Kite’s Plight: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Danger looms larger than ever with the beginning of the Barian invasion, and Yuma must do all he can to protect both his Numbers and his home.
episodes.title: Attack of the Barians: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The stakes for Astral's safety are high when Yuma comes up against a mighty Barian World warrior and his fearsome Chaos Monster.
episodes.title: Attack of the Barians: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yuma gets schooled in a major way when hotshot duelist Devon Knox conducts a class to share some of her expert knowledge.
episodes.title: Hard Knox

episodes.synopsis: Ray comes up with an idea of running Yuma against Caswell for class representative, but things take an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Rule Duel

episodes.synopsis: Things get hairy with the Barians when the president of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges Shark to a duel.
episodes.title: The Adventures of Artimus Stanleyus

episodes.synopsis: All eyes are on Shark's twin sister, Rio, when she arrives for her first day at school, including those of a Barian botanist.
episodes.title: Doom in Bloom

episodes.synopsis: Yuma's Numbers are at risk once again with the arrival of a new Barian. But some unexpected drama with Tori throws a wrench in the works.
episodes.title: Rivals in the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Friends are forever ... at least until they start fighting. So when Yuma's pals find themselves arguing, it's time for a little friendly competition.
episodes.title: The Friendship Games

episodes.synopsis: Yuma and Astral are in terrible danger when a scary new Barian adversary shows up with one of the most powerful weapons from his world.
episodes.title: Sphere Cube Calamity:  Part 1

episodes.synopsis: It's starting to look like Yuma is at the edge of defeat in his battle with Mizar. But then help comes from an unexpected source.
episodes.title: Sphere Cube Calamity:  Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to knock some sense into Yuma, Shark decides to steal his key. Now, Yuma must find a way to get it back.
episodes.title: Playing Defense

episodes.synopsis: Yuma puts himself on the line again by facing off against a Barian foe. This time, he's taking on Alito and his Battlin' Boxers.
episodes.title: Counter Offensive: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the battle between Yuma and his Barian foe rages on, it looks like Alito might have Yuma on the ropes. But can Yuma turn things around?
episodes.title: Counter Offensive: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Ray could be in big trouble when Girag shows up with a taste for revenge. Yuma does what he can to help out, but will it be enough?
episodes.title: Dual Duel: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: It's beginning to look like Yuma and Ray are at the mercy of their Barian foe, Girag. But then Ray reveals a secret that changes everything.
episodes.title: Dual Duel: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Astral and Yuma feel they've bitten off more than they can chew, they're forced to seek help from an unexpected source.
episodes.title: Darkness Dawns

episodes.synopsis: Orbital 7 takes an immediate shine to Lillybot. So when he finds out that she's in trouble, he comes roaring to the rescue to save her.
episodes.title: You Give Love A Bot Name

episodes.synopsis: Shark and his twin sister, Rio, are at odds over his controlling ways, so she decides to start standing up for herself and fighting back.
episodes.title: Take a Chance

episodes.synopsis: The gang gets the opportunity to dress up as their favorite monsters for a school fair. But things turn ugly with Anna's arrival.
episodes.title: An Imperfect Couple: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Yuma begins to understand the danger that comes with being Anna's boyfriend when her teacher plays a Barian card.
episodes.title: An Imperfect Couple: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yuma's got enough trouble as it is in the present. But his life grows even more complicated by a specter who appears from his past.
episodes.title: Enter Vector

episodes.synopsis: When Ray sends out an urgent call for help, Yuma rushes to do what he can and finds him battling a Barian villain named Vector.
episodes.title: The Search for Shadows

episodes.synopsis: Yuma is willing to do whatever he can to come to Ray's rescue. But a bombshell from Vector could change everything.
episodes.title: Shadows of Deception

episodes.synopsis: After Vector unveils some disturbing information, Yuma is more determined than ever to tackle him. But he mighthave to do it without Astral.
episodes.title: Sinister Shadows

episodes.synopsis: It's all been coming down to this. But to defeat the Barians once and for all, the gang will have to give it all they've got.
episodes.title: Shadows End
